item.title: Blog: On Being Other
item.description: I read an article the other day about how general acceptance of homosexuality has declined for the first time since the 80s. It feels like just another worrying intimation of the overall social regression going on everywhere you look these days. And yes, I realise that makes me sound like an old man, comparing today with golden yesterdays – but I don’t think I’m wrong. Being bi or gay, or being black, or asian, or an immigrant, or being short, or fat, or even being a woman sometimes… Whatever it is, it makes you an “other”.
